name: Hangman Online
description:
It's the classic game of Hangman, except with a twist - all of the words are submitted to an online database by you, the players! If the game is too easy or hard for you, no problem. Just submit some new words to the database! Or, try to stump the world with words that will be hard to guess. Don't submit gibberish though, as all submissions are reviewed before approval.

So what are you waiting for? Learn new words and show off your linguistic skills by playing hangman today!
